reviewText: This is one of the better stripper videos I've seen, with some caveats. It's full of gorgeous and sexy women who know how to dance erotically. There's one scene in particular of three dang sexy girls playing with each other on stage that will melt you in your chair. With an exception of one segment, the camerawork is very good too, not overly manipulated or too artsy like some Playboy videos are. I do wish that there were more full-length stripper acts, though, since some segments are just parts of acts, and the length of the DVD is rather short at about 50 minutes. I should note too that two segments are not stage acts, but are set elsewhere. As, one segment has a woman stripping for a man with the two of them alone in a home. Overall, this DVD is very enjoyable, so I sure hope it's not out of production because that would be a shame.

I loved this film it was great fun, very sexy, the three best scenes that are reccomended are the ones with the bernett in the bar shaving the other girls ..., then the blonde in the bedroom scene, and the best(the last scene) is  from the woman on the cover of the case, with her gorgeouse and exoctic body dancing, with a terrific love scene, beautiful girls just the way God made them to be, check this one out, its worth it.

this movie expressed the art of strippers... it showed how they can become sexy and elegant at the same time... my buddies and I really really enjoyed this flick and would request it to any men who are just bored one day.
